short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This Flash News allows to read and hear the news from everywhere just with one click.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Online Newspaper!!!... 

If no time to read, then just listen to our Flash News….
Catch the latest news in no time from anywhere without disturbing your work balance. 
No worries, if your busy schedule delays you down in reading the latest news from your favorite newspaper, just give ear to the latest news available with one touch.

It’s just easy to handle. Add the Flash News extension to your Chrome browser. Click on them, get the latest news. Either read them or hear them.
